snippet.title: Knight George - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Play as titular character Knight George in an adventure to save the kingdom of Earlyne!

Knight George is an old-school Action-RPG which pays tribute to the Game Boy in all its 4-color glory. This game will make you go through dungeons using various items, help people out in many quests and ultimately fight large bosses to save your kingdom from the evil wizard Feli'Seth!

Coming to PC in 2026!

--------------

Demo available on Itch.io: https://linky439.itch.io/knight-george
